abstract: Did David Einhorn turn down Warren E. Buffett? That’s the suggestion from Insider Monkey. The blog thinks the Greenlight Capital chief may have been one of the unidentified fund managers to take themselves out of the running to become heir apparent to manage the investments at Berkshire Hathaway.

lead_paragraph: Did David Einhorn, chief of the hedge fund Greenlight Capital, turn down Warren E. Buffett?
